thread.title: ‘People have asked me why Premam was a hit’
thread.title_full: ‘People have asked me why Premam was a hit’ - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: ‘People have asked me why Premam was a hit’
text:
Premam is one of the highest-grossing Malayalam film ever made but its success had its share of detractors. However, Anoop Menon is certainly not one among them.
The actor tell us, "A lot of people have asked me 'Why Premam is hugely successful? What is there in that movie?' There is a reason why a Premam or Bangalore Days ran for 100 days. Let me ask how many films run for 50 days? Those movies have achieved that and that is no mean feat."
Anoop Menon has a string of releases lined up for this year including Malgudi Days and Pavada .
